an3.6:1.3: Akusalena kāyakammena, akusalena vacīkammena, akusalena manokammena.
an3.6:1.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato bālo veditabbo.
an3.6:2.1: Tīhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
an3.6:2.3: Kusalena kāyakammena, kusalena vacīkammena, kusalena manokammena.
an3.6:2.4: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tīhi dhammehi samannāgato paṇḍito veditabbo.
